metadata.title: Boundary Studies Database
metadata.description: The database contains bibliographic data, map/chart data, and cruise data, concerning geoscience research in the offshore areas of Western Canada and the Northwestern United States.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Create a database documenting geoscience research in the offshore areas of Western Canada and the Northwestern United States.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system.
